backend/main.mo: Defines the actor’s core data models and state for orders, wallet transactions, points, diamonds, products, and access control.
backend/migration.mo: Provides type definitions and a no-op migration function that returns the old actor state unchanged.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and UI style of various frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH-driven color variables and theme tokens for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, AuthGate/AdminGate protection, and global ThemeProvider.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: UI screen showing an access-denied message with a button to return home.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminGate.t: Checks identity and admin role, showing loading, denied, claim, or wrapped admin content accordingly.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Redirects unauthenticated users to login and shows a loader while identity initializes.
frontend/src/components/auth/ClaimAdminA: Displays a form for claiming admin access using username and password with mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/catalog/ProductC: Renders a clickable product card with icon, name, price, and optional auto-delivery badge.
Defines the main app layout with header, routed content, and footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Shows a footer with contact info, social links, legal links, and branding.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Heade: Provides the main site navigation with auth state handling, user menu, and wallet balance display.
frontend/src/components/payments/Payment: Modal for submitting bKash or Nagad payment details including amount and transaction ID.
frontend/src/components/promo/InstallApp: Displays a dismissible install prompt bar encouraging users to install the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on identity, reinitializing and invalidating queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmin.ts: Provides React Query hooks for admins to fetch, approve, and reject wallet top‑up transactions with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminPoints.ts: Contains admin hooks for managing points transactions, purchase requests, diamond purchases, analytics, dashboard stats, and conversion settings.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity auth provider and hook for managing login, identity loading, and status tracking via Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrders.ts: Defines placeholder order‑related hooks returning empty data until backend support is added.
frontend/src/hooks/usePoints.ts: Provides hooks for fetching and mutating caller points data including balances, transactions, purchase requests, diamond purchases, and ad rewards.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Offers hooks for products, user profiles, user roles, user lists, and admin access with React Query integration.
frontend/src/hooks/useTransactions.ts: Hook for submitting wallet add‑money transactions and invalidating related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useWallet.ts: Provides hooks to fetch the caller's wallet balance and top‑up transactions.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers, theme variables, dark mode colors, and custom UI utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AddMoneyPage.tsx: Shows wallet balance, transaction history, and provides modal-driven flow for submitting add-money transactions via bkash or nagad.
Admin dashboard displaying transactions, orders, users, analytics, and conversion settings with approve/reject actions.
frontend/src/pages/AdRewardsPage.tsx: Displays points balance, daily ad progress, and lets users watch ads to earn points with limit checks and reward mutation.
frontend/src/pages/BuyDiamondsWithPoints: Allows users to convert points into diamonds based on conversion settings and submit purchase requests.
frontend/src/pages/BuyPointsPage.tsx: Enables users to buy points using wallet balance, submit purchase requests with transaction IDs, and view past requests.
frontend/src/pages/ContactUsPage.tsx: Static contact page offering Telegram and email support info.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: User dashboard showing wallet, points, orders, transactions, and a profile setup dialog if profile is missing.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page showing hero content, promotional badges, a CTA to add money, and a new-offer card along with predefined Free Fire product items.
frontend/src/pages/IdCodeTopUpPage.tsx: Page for selecting a diamond package and entering a player UID, conditionally showing payment instructions.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login page using Internet Identity, redirecting authenticated users to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/RegisterPage.tsx: Registration page with disabled form fields that relies on Internet Identity login to create an account.
frontend/src/pages/TopupPage.tsx: Product selection page for top-ups, handling ID-code navigation, authentication checks, and order creation with toasts.
frontend/src/utils/transactionId.ts: Generates a unique transaction ID using a timestamp and random string.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL query or hash parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from the URL.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s state, requirements, features, and pending Add Money workflow tasks.
